response.overview: The girl lives with her mother in a small railway station. As soon as I found out, the girl grew up and started working at that station, and the classmate she was in love with went to school in the city. The girl was wandering around imagining that everything would be perfect, but in the summer, when her classmate came with his girlfriend, the story of the film unfolded, showing how young people's lives change like a bird leaving its nest.
response.title: Шувуухай
